articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at 00:00 on October 10, the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					 He entered the hall where the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The chief of a guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before them was a floral basket in the name of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae and other senior officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Military Parade, Mass Demonstration Mark WPK's 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Military Parade, Mass Demonstration Mark WPK's 70th Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A military parade and mass demonstration took place with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square here Saturday, the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), arrived at the square.
					
					 A ceremony of the guard of honor of the KPA Ground, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force and Worker-Peasant Red Guards took place to greet him.
					
					 He took the tribune of honor of the square.
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, and others, officials of the C.C., the WPK, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, and commanding officers of the KPA.
					
					 Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, appeared there.
					
					  Also taking the reviewing stands of the tribune of honor were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, and others, Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, Chansy Phosikham, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and chairman of its Organization Committee,  and Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam and director of its Mass Movement Department.
					
					  Seen at reviewing stands were the delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, former unconverted long-term prisoners who are pro-reunification patriotic fighters, heroes, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons related to revolutionary activities of the peerlessly great persons, persons of merits, overseas compatriots congratulatory groups and delegations and overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign party delegations and other delegations, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here and other foreign guests. 
					
					 The flags of the DPRK and the WPK were hoisted at the square.
					
					 A 70-gun salute boomed amid the playing of music of "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a speech for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 When the cars carrying the flags bearing the portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il entered the square, the guard of honor of the Ground, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and all participants in the military parade paid the highest tribute to them.
					
					 The military parade started.
					
					 A column of fighters in the uniforms of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army and a column of service personnel in the period of the building of the regular armed forces after the liberation of the country marched in fine array to the tune of the military music to be followed by columns of Kang Kon Guards Second Infantry Division, Seoul Guards Third Infantry Division, Seoul Kim Chaek Guards 4th Infantry Division and other guards units, columns of political operatives, children's guards and other columns of those who fought in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 Then followed the columns of the company of Mt. Taedok from where the slogan of "A-match-for-a-hundred" originated, the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division, fighter-group of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, the unit which built the West Sea Barrage and other units which made distinguished services to the party, the leader, the country and its people from the post-war period till now.
					
					 Marching past the tribune of honor were columns of Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, Kim Jong Suk Naval University, Kim Chaek University of Air Force, Kang Kon Military Academy and other military academies at all levels of the KPA and units of Ground, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force and Strategic Force, airwomen's unit, units of arms and services, special forces and Pyongyang Institute. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un acknowledged the salute of the columns. 
					
					 Planes flew in the sky above the square depicting the emblem of the WPK and the figures "70".
					
					 Marching past were columns of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, the Young Red Guards and the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 Columns of different types of artillery pieces, armored cars, tanks, drones, strategic rockets and other latest Korean-style weaponry and ultra-precision strike means rumbled past the square. 
					
					 When the column of the brass band passed the square, playing the revolutionary military song and forming the word "Victory", planes flied through the sky above the square to conclude the parade, making three color smoke. 
					
					 Then followed a demonstration of Pyongyangites.
					
					 The columns of demonstrators escorting the cars carrying the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il entered the square to be followed by ranks of dancers with party flags, service persons' families and other columns and demonstrators with floats and slogan boards. 
					
					 Letters reading "Kim Il Sung", "Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Un", "Celebration of 70th Anniversary", "Protecting the Leader unto Death", "Mother Party", "Ideological Power", "Military Power", "Youthful Power", etc. and the flags of the WPK and the DPRK were formed on the square in succession.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed and lots of balloons were released in the sky at the end of the demonstration.
					
					 Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the masses.

articles.title: Torchlight Procession of Young Vanguard Heldã€€
articles.content:
Torchlight Procession of Young Vanguard Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A torchlight procession of young vanguard "Young People, Forward toward Great Party!" was held with splendor in Pyongyang in the evening of Saturday, the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Amid the playing of welcome music, Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appeared in the tribune of honor of the square.
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and others, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, officials of the party and armed forces organs, persons of merits and Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, Chansy Phosikham, secretary of  the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and chairman of its Organization Committee,  and Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam and director of its Mass Movement Department, appeared there.
					
					  Seen at the reviewing stands were the delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, former unconverted long-term prisoners, heroes, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons related to revolutionary activities of the peerlessly great persons, persons of merits, overseas compatriots congratulatory groups and delegations and overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign party delegations and other delegations, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here and other foreign guests. 
					
					 Open cars carrying the flags bearing the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il entered the square, escorted by young vanguard holding torchlight batons.
					
					 The august names of the peerlessly great men were depicted by torch holders at the square to be followed by the torchlight formation of the letters "Founder", "General Secretary", etc. and the emblem of the WPK.
					
					 Columns of the revolutionary schools, university students and working youths started the march.
					
					 A column of the torchlight procession forming the august name of Kim Jong Un marched past in fine array.
					
					 Columns depicting letters "The Workers' Party of Korea", a model of the torch of the Tower of the Juche Idea and letters "Juche", "Revolutionary Tradition" and "Believing in the People as in Heaven" marched past while torch holders formed models of the party flag and the Marshal Star and letters "Leader" and "Glory" at the square.
					
					 Columns of the torchlight procession changed their ranks, forming letters "Comradeship", "Single-minded Unity" and "Songun Politics".
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved his hands to acknowledge the young vanguard.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed to gorgeously adorn the nocturnal sky.
					
					 At the end of the torchlight procession, stormy cheers of "hurrah!" shook the square.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese Party Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 Present there were Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Liu Yunshan said that the Korean people have achieved great successes in the economic construction and the improvement of the people's living standard, adding that this is the fruition of the wise leadership of First Secretary Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Delegation of Communist Party of China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Delegation of Communist Party of China
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Friday received a delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, on an official goodwill visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Kim Jong Un met with members of the delegation and had a cordial conversation with them.
					
					 Liu Yunshan extended thanks to Kim Jong Un for receiving the delegation and warmly congratulated the C.C., the WPK and all its members and the Korean people on the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK upon the authorization of the C.C., the CPC and General Secretary Xi Jinping.
					
					 He said that the WPK led the Korean people and achieved the independence of the country and the liberation of the people and made noteworthy successes in the socialist revolution and construction of Korea, overcoming the manifold difficulties, under the leadership of the great leader of the Korean people President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that the party, government and people of China are sincerely rejoiced over the great achievements made by the Korean people in various fields including economic development and improvement of the people's living standard thanks to the leadership and organizational ability of First Secretary Kim Jong Un who is carrying out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and to the appeal of the WPK in recent years, in particular.
					
					 Kim Jong Un wished the delegation's visit to the DPRK a significant one making a positive contribution to inheriting and developing the good tradition between the two parties and two peoples.
					
					 The DPRK-China relations are not merely the neighborly ones but have become strategic relations rooted in the tradition of friendship forged with blood, he said, adding: The greatest feat and legacy in the foreign work left by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for us is the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Saying that the tradition should not be recorded only in history book and textbook but inherited and glorified in practice, he noted that it is the will of the WPK and the Korean people to further consolidate the traditional DPRK-China friendship generation after generation.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the invincible vitality of the DPRK-China friendship, treasure common to the peoples of the two countries, will be more dynamically displayed in the future thanks to the efforts of both sides.
					
					 He exchanged with the guests the issue of boosting the bilateral relations and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 He was presented with a gift by Liu Yunshan.
					
					 He expressed thanks for this and had a photo session with all members of the delegation.
					
					 Present there were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Zhang Yesui, executive vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Song Tao, executive deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the C.C., the CPC, Yin Fanglong, deputy director of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Liu Hongcai, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Li Chenqun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and other members of the delegation.
					
					 Also on hand were Kim Ki Nam and Kim Yang Gon, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, on Saturday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I send the warmest congratulations to you on behalf of the Communist Party of Cuba and the Cuban people on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 I wish the fraternal DPRK greater successes in socialist construction, extending friendly greetings to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of PLO Executive Committee
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of PLO Executive Committee 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Saturday received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO).
					 In the message the chairman extended warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the friendly people of the DPRK and leadership and officials of the WPK and its members in struggle on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the friendly WPK, and wished Kim Jong Un and the Korean people greater prosperity and happiness.
					
					 We highly appreciate Your Excellency's support to the just cause of our people who have waged a protracted struggle for retaking freedom, building an independent state and achieving fair peace, the message said, adding:
					
					 We are proud of the historic friendship and cooperation and bonds of solidarity between our two countries and two peoples, assuring you that we would pay attention and make efforts to boost these relations in conformity with the interests of the two peoples.
					
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on Oct. 6.
					 In the message he extended warm and fraternal congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un and the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and all its members and the Korean people on behalf of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and all its members and the Lao people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the great leaders of the Korean people President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un, the successor to their great revolutionary cause, over the past seven decades, the fraternal Korean people have waged a  valiant and dynamic struggle to reliably defend the gains of revolution from imperialism and registered steady great achievements in all works to implement the party's lines, ensure political stability, develop economy and improve the people's living standard true to the Juche idea and the Songun line, the message said.
					
					 Sincerely congratulating the fraternal Korean people on their great achievements made in the past period, the Lao People's Revolutionary Party hopes that the WPK and the fraternal Korean people will make fresh greater successes in the efforts to accomplish the cause of defending the country and building rich and powerful socialist Korea and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, it noted.
					
					 It also hoped that the traditional relations of friendship between the two parties, states and peoples would grow stronger for the sake of regional and global peace, friendship and cooperation.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and great success in his noble work.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a congratulatory message by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Saturday, the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The message paid high tribute to great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who pioneered and led the cause of Juche-oriented party building and extended eternal glory to them.
					
					 It offered highest glory and warmest thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un who ushered in a new heyday of the WPK by carrying forward and developing their cause of party building. 
					
					 It said that President Kim Il Sung's founding of the WPK marked a great event which brought about a drastic turn in carving out the destiny of the people in the motherland and overseas compatriots and opened up the era of the Workers' Party shining in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years. 
					
					 It noted that leader Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and developed the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization in which the unitary ideological system and leadership system of the leader have been thoroughly established and the mother party, which formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses and serves the people. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un has brought about a new phase in building the party and carrying out the Juche revolutionary cause by holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and declaring the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the party, it said. 
					
					 The history of Chongryon is a proud and glorious course as it gave origin to the overseas compatriots movement of Juche and demonstrated victory and dignity thanks to the outstanding idea and leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, the message said.
					
					 It expressed the resolution to make a tangible contribution to the building of a thriving socialist nation, dynamically wage the movement for national reunification, boost the good-neighborly and friendly relations with progressive personages and other Japanese so as to create circumstances and conditions favorable for the movement of Koreans in Japan on the initiative of Chongryon and contribute to developing the DPRK-Japan relations.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in China 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a congratulatory message by the General Association of Koreans in China on October 6 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The message said that the WPK is the ever-victorious and experienced party which has recorded only victories in the red flag of the revolution for 70 years since its foundation was declared before the world and a genuine mother party which took care of all children and put them on the height of the era.
					
					 The great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an organizer and guide of all victories of the people and led the revolution and construction to one victory after another with their outstanding idea and tested leadership for over half a century, glorifying the country and its people, times and history, the message said, adding that their exploits will last forever. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Having Marshal Kim Jong Un at the highest post of the WPK marked a political event of great significance in developing the WPK and a great national auspicious one guaranteeing rosy prospect of Songun Korea and ever-lasting future of the nation. 
					
					 The message expressed the resolution to fully embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism in the practical activities, dynamically wage the drive for building the motherland into a prosperous socialist power and firmly consolidate the General Association of Koreans in China as patriotic ranks with strong Juche character and national identity, true to the Juche-based idea of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu on the overseas compatriots movement.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Saturday.
					 On October 10, Juche 34 (1945) President Kim Il Sung declared before the whole world the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), a solemn declaration heralding the birth of new-type revolutionary party in the era of independence guided by the immortal Juche idea and a great event which opened up a new origin of the national history, the message said.
					
					 The President developed the WPK into the revolutionary party strong in independence, unfazed by any storm and stress, and the invincible vanguard ranks with strong sense of organization and discipline, deeply rooted among the masses, it noted.
					
					 The WPK founded and led by Kim Il Sung more powerfully demonstrated its might as the party of the leader and the guiding vanguard in the era of Songun thanks to General Kim Jong Il, it said, adding that the WPK founded and led by the great leaders is greeting a great heyday as it holds in high esteem Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man.
					
					 The 70 year-long history of victory and glory covered by the WPK proves in practice the immutable truth that when the great leaders are held in high esteem generation after generation, the dignity of the party is put on the highest level, national power fully demonstrated and the bright future of the nation guaranteed, it said.
					
					 It called for waging an active struggle to bring earlier the national reconciliation, unity and reunification, invariably holding aloft the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as the great programmes common to the nation in the new century, the landmarks of peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., Lao Political Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., Lao Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gift was handed over to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, on Saturday by head of a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party Chansy Phosikham, secretary of its Central Committee and chairman of its Organization Committee, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the chairperson of the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Head of Vietnamese Party Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Head of Vietnamese Party Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by the head of a delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 The gift was conveyed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by head of the delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of its Central Committee and director of its Mass Movement Department, on Saturday.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by Secretary General of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea Mukesh Sharma and a member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The gifts were conveyed to the DPRK ambassadors to India and Myanmar by the above-said personages on October 6.

articles.title: AP President Here
articles.content:
AP President Here
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- AP President Gary Pruitt arrived here Saturday to attend the AP photo exhibit for marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and youth and students visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 Seen standing before their statues was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and industrial establishments, co-operative farms and schools in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 A floral basket was placed there in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in various places of the city including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the Mansudae Art Studio.

articles.title: Senior State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Senior state and army officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Saturday, the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK and officials of the armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations and the party Central Committee.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also seen there was a floral basket in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 Placed there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK and LPRP Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK and LPRP Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) were held here Saturday.
					 Present there from the WPK's side were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials of the C.C., the WPK, and from the opposite side were members of the LPRP delegation headed by Chansy Phosikham, secretary of its Central Committee and chairman of its Organization Committee, and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 The talks discussed the issue of boosting the relations between the two parties and the issues of mutual concerns.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Hosts Reception for CPV Delegation
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Hosts Reception for CPV Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Saturday hosted a reception in honor of the visitiing delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV). 
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation of the CPV led by Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of its Central Committee and director of its Mass Movement Department, and Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK. 
					
					 Secretary Choe Thae Bok and Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and other officials of the C.C., the WPK were present there. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said in his speech that the WPK has strengthened iinto the most revolutionary and militant, invincible party under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He noted that it is the consistent stand of the DPRK to invariably boost the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation which were forged by the preceding leaders and to which the top leaders of the two countries pay deep attention. 
					
					 Ha Thi Khiet extended congratulations to the Korean people on having made leaping progress in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the WPK, adding that the party, government and people of Vietnam would always set store by and boost the friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Receptions Given to Mark WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Receptions Given to Mark WPK's Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Receptions were given at Mokran House, the People's Palace of Culture, Okryu Restaurant and Chongryu Restaurant Saturday to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK and delegates to the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Also present there were heads of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China and overseas compatriots on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were a delegation of the Communist Party of China, a party and government delegation of the Republic of Cuba, a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and other foreign delegations, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Speeches were made by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop and Ro Tu Chol at the receptions.
					
					 The speakers said that the whole country is celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK as the grand political festival with splendor.
					
					 The WPK has recorded a heroic epic of great changes startling the world in the history of the country by successfully embodying the idea and leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for seven decades since its foundation, they said, adding:
					
					 The WPK's dignity and might are being demonstrated in the highest level in the glorious Kim Jong Un's era.
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people will build the best power on this land to be envied by the world and surely achieve the independent reunification of the country with the concerted efforts of the nation. 
					
					 The WPK will strengthen solidarity with the revolutionary parties and progressive people in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and wage a dynamic struggle for the global peace and security and prosperity and independent development common to mankind.

articles.title: Reception Given for Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Reception Given for Overseas Compatriots
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A reception was given on Saturday in honor of overseas compatriots for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were the delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the delegation of officials of the General Association of Koreans in China, the delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada, the delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia and other overseas compatriots delegations and overseas compatriots staying in the homeland.
					
					 Also on hand were Kim Pyong Ho, chairman of the Committee for Aiding overseas Compatriots of Korea, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Military Parade and Mass Demonstration Start in Celebration of WPK's 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Military Parade and Mass Demonstration Start in Celebration of WPK's 70th Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A military parade and mass demonstration are now under way with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, took the tribune of honor of the square.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet at Chongjin Port
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet at Chongjin Port 
						
 Chongjin, October 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Chongjin Port on Saturday to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leone-flagged ship YUAN-7. 
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting President Kim Il Sung declared before the world the foundation of the WPK on October 10, 1945. 
					
					 The President wisely led the WPK for several decades to be highly praised by the world progressives as the great leader who created a brilliant model in building the revolutionary party of Juche, they said, adding:
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK has developed into the party of Kim Il Sung and the mother party, which formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses and serves them. 
					
					 Today the WPK is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the great leaders along the ever-victorious road under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: WPK's Feats for World Socialist Movement
articles.content:
WPK's Feats for World Socialist Movement
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the progressive mankind of the world recall the feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who created a new history in the cause of global socialism by leading the WPK.
					 President Kim Il Sung clarified the Juche theory of socialism in the course of the struggle to reject modern revisionism and strengthen the Korean revolution and the world socialist movement and had worked heart and soul to carry it into practice.
					
					 Under his guidance, the WPK fully supported other nations' struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism and strove for the unity of world socialist movement, proceeding from the principled and independent stand.
					
					 In the late 20th century, leader Kim Jong Il authored "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party", "Socialism Is a Science" and other celebrated works and had the historic Pyongyang declaration adopted, so as to show the road ahead of the world socialist movement.
					
					 Thanks to his idea and leadership, the WPK developed into an ever-victorious and steel-strong party and made a great contribution to the victorious advance of the cause of global socialism with the Songun (military-first) politics, thus winning the absolute trust of world progressive parties and people.
					
					 It is still and creditably charging its mission as the vanguard unit in accomplishing the socialist cause under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated across Country
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated across Country
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was celebrated with splendor in the DPRK. 
					 An endless stream of people visited the statues and portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in various parts of the country.
					
					 Service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life, school youth and children laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the tender-hearted images of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them.
					
					 People visited the venues of exhibitions of immortal flowers and the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in every province, city and county. 
					
					 Performances took place at theaters, houses and outdoor stages across the country.
					
					 7 000 working people and school youth and children staged a performance in praise of the WPK at Hamhung Square.
					
					 Performances given in provinces including South Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces reflected the steadfast faith of the Korean people to fly generation after generation the red flag that fluttered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Agricultural workers across the country held cheerful peasant dancing parties and children of the Wonsan Orphans' Primary and Secondary Schools held a kite-flying game.
					
					 Working people, builders and members of shock brigades in the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, the February 8 Vinalon Complex, construction sites of the stockbreeding base in the area of Sepho, Taean Heavy Machine Complex and Mikok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City pleasantly enjoyed the holiday.
					
					 Public catering establishments across the country served special holiday food and happy working people spent their pleasant times in parks, recreation grounds and resting places.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed in every provincial capital on the evening of the day.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Welcome Participants in Military Parade
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Welcome Participants in Military Parade 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Pyongyangites warmly welcomed the ranks of participants in the military parade passing through streets of the capital. It was held in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Saturday in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Streets in Pyongyang were crowded with citizens who turned out to welcome them. 
					
					 Flags of the WPK and the DPRK and red flags were seen fluttering along the route, posters celebrating the WPK's 70th birthday, slogans reading "Let's protect the leader unto death" and "Great army-people unity" and varieties of decorations were set up. 
					
					 Pyongyangites including school youth and children warmly congratulated with garlands the participants passing before them, flying the colours of the Supreme Commander, flags of the WPK and the DPRK. 
					
					 The warm welcome accorded by Pyongyangites to the participants in the military parade along the tens of kilometers-long route fully demonstrated the sky-high spirit of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea where its service personnel and people are dynamically advancing toward the bright future, single-mindedly united around the great party.

articles.title: Papers Mark 70th Founding Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Papers Mark 70th Founding Anniversary of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leading papers of the DPRK Saturday editorially call for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of the great party on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the 70-year history of the WPK is one of attaching importance to the ideology and one which built the great ideological power.
					
					 And it is the history of attaching importance to arms and building a matchless military power and one which built an invincible youthful power.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The red flag which was held aloft in the period of hewing out the revolution is still vigorously fluttering without losing its color even a bit. Its master key lies in that our party has consistently attached importance to the ideological work, always holding fast to ideology.
					
					 Our party has successfully implemented the line of attaching importance to arms and military affairs for several decades, holding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, invincible and iron-willed commanders, in high esteem.
					
					 Korea, once a weak nation mercilessly trampled down amid big powers' fierce scramble for influence, made a breakthrough in the hegemonic and unfair international political order and emerged a military power and nuclear weapons state of the world, guaranteeing the destiny and prosperity of the nation forever. This is the great exploit which could be performed only by the WPK advancing under the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The 70-year history and exploits of the WPK serve as a model of the era which no other party can neither imitate nor create, an ever-lasting source of the prosperity of socialist Korea and eternal cornerstone for the victory of the cause of global independence.
					
					 Minju Joson says that unshakable are the faith and will of the Korean army and people to dynamically make long journeys of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK Lauded
articles.content:
WPK Lauded
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea has been leading the Korean revolution along the road of victory, enjoying popular support.
					 The progressive mankind and press media of the world say it is the key to the great successes made by the DPRK despite of the imperialist allied forces' moves to isolate and stifle it that the entire Korean people absolutely trust in and follow the WPK, firmly rallied around their leader.
					
					 Russian paper Bremya Peremon Plus TV reported that the WPK has always remained friendly in the hearts of the people, devotedly served them and pushed forward the revolution and construction with their concerted efforts.
					
					 The WPK has consistently pursued the benevolent politics full of love for and trust in the people, it stressed.
					
					 The secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said:
					
					 The WPK is characterized by its loving care for the people, devotion to them and the harmonious whole with the popular masses.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the WPK could demonstrate its dignity as the mother party which reliably shoulders the destiny and future of the people. Now the capability of the WPK grows stronger under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Uruguayan paper La Juventud in an article "The Great Leader of Mother Party" said the WPK would surely emerge victorious, enjoying unreserved support of the people, as it is led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Action against S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Trade Unions Declared
articles.content:
Action against S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Trade Unions Declared
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions and the Government Employees Union of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 6 at which they declared an action protesting against the authorities' suppression of trade unions, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 The confederation said the authorities' move to close the office of the Government Employees Union is aimed at mounting a preemptive attack not only to suppress the trade union but also put down the struggle of workers and the democratic trade union movement.
					
					 The Government Employees Union said it would launch actions such as sit-in strike and candlelight rally for protecting the office.
					
					 Speakers demanded the authorities stop at once the suppression of trade unions and moves for retrogressively revising the labor law.

articles.title: 30WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Ecuador
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Ecuador
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place in Quito, Ecuador on Oct. 2.
					 Present at the meeting were figures of a political party, organizations and bodies including the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, Communist Party of Ecuador, Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung, Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification and other masses.
					
					 Milton Burbano Bohorquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in his speech that the 70 year-long history of the WPK is the sacred days in which the WPK has demonstrated only victories and glory under the leadership of the great leaders, adding:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung fathered the Juche idea centered on the popular masses and founded the WPK, guided by it.
					
					 The Korean revolution could emerge victorious with the powerful militant staff thanks to the founding of the new-type revolutionary party guided by the great Juche idea.
					
					 The Korean people united close around the great party will win only victories in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the country's reunification and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in various countries on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They were held at a cinema in Havana, Cuba and by two companies of Indonesia, furniture factory in Abuja, Nigeria, Algerian Newspaper El Khabar and in Maribor City, Slovenia from Sept. 30 to Oct. 7.
					
					 Screened at the film shows were Korean films "Monument to Party Founding", "Songdowon International Children's Camp" and "Historic Sites in Kaesong".

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated by Guinean Figure
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated by Guinean Figure
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said that it was a great event in developing the Korean revolution that President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945, adding:
					
					 The President provided a firm foundation for founding the party in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and achieved the historic cause of founding the party after the country's liberation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il turned the WPK into the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people with his outstanding idea and tested leadership.
					
					 The founding and development of the WPK guided by great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism would be unthinkable without the glorious revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and energetic revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We wish the members of the WPK and other people big successes in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation, united close around the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held by the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran and lectures given by the Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), at Progres School of Mali and the Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army from Sept. 29 to Oct. 3 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran praised President Kim Il Sung as the leader of the people who founded the WPK and the DPRK and dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness and a staunch anti-imperialist fighter who firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and socialism from all challenges of the forces hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Only victory and glory will be in store for the WPK headed by respected HE Kim Jong Un, he said, wishing the Korean people bigger successes in their efforts for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The commander of the first commando of Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army said the WPK has always emerged victorious for the past 70 years since its founding.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Nigerian, Slovenian Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Nigerian, Slovenian Bodies
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Slovenian bodies posted articles on their websites to observe the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Party praised by people" on Sept. 28, which said:
					
					 The WPK, when shaping even a single line or policy, has made sure that it thoroughly reflects the aspiration and wishes of the people. It has never allowed any retreat or slackness in carrying out its policies for the people no matter how difficult the economic situation of the country might be.
					
					 Popular policies were invariably enforced in the DPRK despite the worst ordeals and difficulties caused by the imperialist allied forces' intensified offensive against socialism and consecutive natural disasters.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious as it is absolutely supported by the people.
					
					 The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association posted an article titled "Socialism is lifeline of Korean people" on Sept. 30, which noted:
					
					 Socialism is the source of the happy life of the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean people are defending socialism with their lives.
					
					 They are leading a happy life, being genuine masters of everything under the socialist system.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their allies are working hard to stifle socialism of the DPRK but the law governing the development of history can never change and socialism is sure to always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Cambodian Political Party Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian Political Party Visits DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia led by its president visited the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on October 5 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The delegation laid a floral basket in the name of the party before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party said:
					
					 The WPK with a history spanning 70 years is a model of the world progressive parties as it is absolutely trusted and supported by the popular masses for having adhered to the policies and lines thoroughly reflecting the wishes and will of the people with their interests placed above all in its activities and work.
					
					 The WPK founded by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and developed into an invincible party by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is further demonstrating its might as a party always emerging victorious under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Our Khmer Democratic Party ardently wishes to boost its solidarity with the WPK and learn from its experience and leadership method.
					
					 It is our sincere hope that only glory and victory will be in store for the WPK and the Korean people under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tablet Displayed at Russian Railway Station to Honor Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tablet Displayed at Russian Railway Station to Honor Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A tablet was displayed with due ceremony on Oct. 6 at Novosibirsk Railway Station of Russia to honor President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The tablet reads "Comrade Kim Il Sung, president of the DPRK, visited the station on May 21, 1984", "Comrade Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the station on August 11, 2001".
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Western Siberia Railway Bureau of Russia, the Novosibirsk Regional Government and Novosibirsk Railway Station and other masses, the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials and DPRK officials working in Novosibirsk.
					
					 The tablet was unveiled by a vice-director of the Western Siberia Railway Bureau of Russia and Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia.
					
					 Bouquets were laid before the tablet.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by a Peruvian publishing house on Oct. 2.
					 The work published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995) serves as a great programme for party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new road of building the revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way of strengthening the party into his eternal party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Romania
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by a Romanian publishing house.
					 The work published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the Korean revolutionary cause to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Oct. 2.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en dia de fundacion de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en dia de fundacion de PTC
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 10 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y rindio el sublime homenaje a los companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas de pie.
					
					Fueron depositados ahi un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del CC del PTC.
					
					El Mariscal junto con los participantes les expreso sublime homenaje.
					
					En el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal junto con los participantes rindio homenaje al Presidente.
					
					Lo hizo en el otro salon de eternidad donde se conserva el cuerpo del Dirigente.
					
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Discurso de Kim Jong Un pronunciado en desfile militar y manifestacion multitudinaria de pyongyangneses
articles.content:
Discurso de Kim Jong Un pronunciado en desfile militar y manifestacion multitudinaria de pyongyangneses
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso en el desfile militar y la manifestacion multitudinaria de los ciudadanos de Pyongyang en conmemoracion del aniversario 70 de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El texto completo del discurso va como sigue:
					
					Heroicos soldados y oficiales del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y oficiales y otros combatientes participantes en la parada militar en conmemoracion del aniversario 70 del glorioso Partido del Trabajo de Corea,
					
					Miembros de la Guardia Roja Obrera-Campesina y de la Guardia Roja Juvenil,
					
					Estimados ciudadanos de Pyongyang,
					
					Todos los miembros del Partido y demas trabajadores del pais,
					
					Compatriotas en ultramar y amigos extranjeros,
					
					Companeros: 
					
					Pletoricos del gran orgullo y jubilo de los vencedores, hoy acogemos la fiesta de octubre en la que flamea en lo alto del cielo la bandera del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El 10 de octubre es para nuestra patria y pueblo un significativo festejo revolucionario que celebra el nacimiento de la genuina vanguardia y estado mayor combativo de la revolucion, responsable de su destino y su guia. 
					
					La parada militar y el desfile de masas de hoy demostraran plenamente el inagotable poderio firmemente consolidado por nuestro Partido a lo largo de siete decadas de su direccion sobre el Ejercito y pueblo, asi como exhibiran ante el mundo el temple revolucionario de todos los militares y civiles que, compactamente unidos en torno al PTC, avanzan con el valor redoblado e inconmovible conviccion hacia un futuro luminoso. 
					
					En este momento en que rememoramos con gran orgullo la sagrada historia del PTC adornada con victorias y gloria, rindo el mas sublime tributo y eterna gloria al gran Lider Kim Il Sung, fundador de nuestro glorioso Partido, y al gran General Kim Jong Il, eterno Secretario General de nuestro prestigioso Partido, el PTC, en reflejo del ilimitado sentimiento de veneracion y sinceridad de millones de miembros de nuestro Partido, todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y demas sectores del pueblo.
					
					Asimismo, rindo el profundo honor a los precursores de la revolucion antijaponesa, los combatientes caidos del Ejercito Popular y los martires patrioticos quienes en fiel acato a la direccion de los grandes lideres dieron todo lo suyo en aras del fortalecimiento del Partido y la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Infinitamente leal al Partido, nuestro pueblo ha superado todos los retos y pruebas con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu para celebrar el septuagesimo aniversario de su fundacion como un gran acontecimiento revolucionario, preparando con su trabajo regalos sin precedentes para el Partido madre. 
					
					En esta plaza de la victoria y de la conmemoracion donde reina la ardorosa lealtad del pueblo, siento profunda gratitud a este, sin el cual seria inconcebible la cita de hoy. Y en este preciso momento percibo con sentido respeto la afectuosa mirada de mi amado pueblo. 
					
					Si a lo largo de siete decenios nuestro Partido ha llevado adelante la revolucion cosechando solamente triunfos y gloria, inmutable ante todas las tempestades, ha sido gracias a su gran pueblo que le ha confiado todo su destino y ha proseguido su causa con lealtad.
					
					La historia de nuestro Partido es precisamente el trayecto recorrido por el pueblo, la fuerza del Partido es la del pueblo, la grandeza del Partido es la del pueblo, y las victorias obtenidas por el Partido son las de nuestro gran pueblo. 
					
					Con motivo del aniversario 70 del PTC, representando a este hago profunda reverencia y extiendo mi mas sincero agradecimiento a todo mi querido pueblo que en las etapas mas severas de la revolucion le ha dado al Partido inagotable fuerza y coraje, ha compartido con el las penas y las alegrias superando con la ferrea voluntad las duras pruebas de la historia y corriendo siempre con el la misma suerte.
					
					Efusivas congratulaciones y sincero agradecimiento a nuestros fidedignos miembros del Partido, heroicos soldados y oficiales del Ejercito Popular y adorables jovenes vanguardias quienes toman parte en este festival de la victoria con la frente bien alta, al protagonizar uno tras otro admirables y heroicos hechos que acortan el tiempo, derramando el sudor y haciendo gala del patriotismo en todos los dominios de la construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y prospero en respuesta al llamamiento del Partido. 
					
					Igualmente les doy calurosa bienvenida a todos los compatriotas radicados fuera del pais y amigos extranjeros, presentes aqui en homenaje a la fiesta del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Companeros:
					
					El PTC ha recorrido una trayectoria orgullosa en la que bajo la direccion de los grandes lideres ha asumido la responsabilidad del destino del pueblo y ha conducido al triunfo la revolucion coreana.
					
					Fueron Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes convirtieron a nuestro Partido en un invencible partido revolucionario, una verdadera agrupacion politica rectora, que lucha por el pueblo y que compone un todo armonioso con las masas populares, lo cual es algo sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Desde que inscribiera en su bandera roja el martillo, la hoz y la pluma, nuestro Partido no se ha alejado nunca del pueblo y ha llevado adelante la revolucion considerandolo siempre como el cielo. 
					
					La historia no registra a ninguna otra revolucion que en circunstancias tan arduas y complejas como las que ha enfrentado nuestra revolucion haya superado paso a paso severas pruebas y contratiempos que deciden su avance o retroceso.
					
					El imperialismo estadounidense, movido por su fanatica ambicion de la hegemonia sobre el mundo, le impuso una encarnizada guerra a la incipiente Corea. Si con gran dificultad restaurabamos apretandonos el cinturon lo que se habia reducido a cenizas, nos amenazaba con otra agresion. Y si nos proponiamos desarrollar la economia nacional nos lo impedia con sanciones y bloqueo sin parangon.
					
					Sin embargo, nuestro Partido desafio siempre toda adversidad con el animo redoblado, abrio en este territorio una nueva historia de grandes transformaciones y cosecho victorias contundentes.
					
					En cada momento dificil de la historia nuestro Partido ha confiado solamente en su gran pueblo y este fue su unico simpatizante, consejero y ayudante.
					
					La historia de nuestro movimiento revolucionario nos ensena que la posicion gobernante o la larga historia de un partido no son factores decisivos para que este disfrute de alto prestigio y gran combatividad e impulse el desarrollo de la revolucion.
					
					El elevado prestigio de nuestro Partido y sus titanicas obras se deben a las excepcionales ideas revolucionarias y arte de direccion del gran Lider y el gran General que presentaron la formula de hacer la revolucion con el amor y confianza hacia el pueblo y la mantuvieron firmemente en la construccion y las actividades del Partido.
					
					Nuestro Partido esta profundamente arraigado en el pueblo y le sirve exclusivamente a el con total entrega, esta es la clave mas importante que le ha permitido impulsar de continuo la causa por la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, tomando firmemente el timon de la revolucion sin alterarse ante cualquier tempestad de la historia.
					
					El PTC es invencible por su unidad monolitica con el pueblo.
					
					Cada vez que trazaba el camino a seguir o encaraba grandes pruebas mientras dirigia el proceso revolucionario, acudio primero al pueblo, aguzo los oidos a sus opiniones escuetas y en su sinceridad encontraba una fuerza inagotable.
					
					La creatividad de las omnipotentes masas populares fue la fuente de hechos admirables que le permitio a nuestro Partido construir un inexpugnable baluarte del socialismo politica, economica y militarmente independiente en este pais donde predominaban el atraso y la pobreza seculares y abrir una nueva etapa de la construccion de una potencia pese al persistente bloqueo impuesto por el imperialismo.
					
					Atender con total responsabilidad la vida politica, material y cultural del pueblo ha sido para nuestro Partido la mas importante e insoslayable mision y deber moral.
					
					Aun en las duras pruebas en que se decidia el destino del pais hizo ingentes esfuerzos para sembrar valiosas semillas en aras de la felicidad del pueblo e incrementar las riquezas del socialismo y no dejo de practicar medidas que benefician al pueblo. Esta politica de amor al pueblo la puede aplicar unicamente nuestro Partido que ha asumido la responsabilidad de su destino.
					
					Nuestro Partido siempre considera a las masas populares como raices de su existencia e inagotable fuente de la fuerza y concede prioridad absoluta a sus intereses, por lo cual el pueblo confia en el y lo sigue como verdadero faro de su destino y como su madre y para nuestro orgullo el pais se ha convertido en un jardin donde florece la unidad monolitica.
					
					Companeros:
					
					Las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias representan las potencialidades del PTC que lucha por el bien del pueblo.
					
					Nuestro pueblo experimento en carne propia que si no posee el ejercito esta condenado a vivir como apatrida y que las armas de la revolucion le garantizan la dignidad y la felicidad.
					
					Gracias a la original linea de autodefensa y la politica del Songun presentadas por el Partido, el Ejercito Popular ha crecido como poderosas tropas elite capaces de aniquilar de un golpe a cualquier agresor. Asimismo se ha perfeccionado constantemente el sistema defensivo de todo el pueblo y Estado, lo cual ha convertido al pais en un baluarte inexpugnable y en una de las mayores potencias militares del mundo. 
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias han sido siempre medios todopoderosos de la defensa de la patria, la revolucion y el pueblo, asi como poderosa vanguardia y brigada de choque que conducen a la patria al florecimiento y al pueblo a la felicidad.
					
					Al presentar la linea del desarrollo paralelo de la economia y la industria de la defensa nacional y combinar de manera organica esta ultima con la construccion socialista, nuestro Partido ha adquirido la valiosa experiencia de elevar a un ritmo acelerado el potencial del Estado en su conjunto, y al mismo tiempo, mejorar la vida de la poblacion, valiendose de sus propios recursos en medio de la gran escasez.
					
					El espiritu indoblegable y la fuerza unida de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que, cara a cara con el cruel imperio estadounidense engordado con agresiones y guerras, le ha propinado vergonzosas derrotas y desafia resueltamente las brutales sanciones y bloqueo de los imperialistas, le provocan al enemigo una indescriptible inquietud y panico. 
					
					Nuestro Partido puede afirmar sin temor a equivocarse que nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias estan totalmente preparadas para responder a cualquier tipo de guerra que desea el imperio estadounidense y defender firmemente el cielo azul de la patria y el bienestar del pueblo.
					
					Companeros:
					
					El PTC se siente particularmente orgulloso de contar con un nutrido ejercito de jovenes que se haran cargo del futuro de la revolucion y del porvenir de la nacion. 
					
					Ya en los primeros dias que le siguieron a su fundacion, presento el aprecio de los jovenes como su lineamiento estrategico, teniendo en cuenta el caracter duradero de la revolucion, y ha venido formandolos como valientes combatientes de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Al empenarse de ordinario en la educacion de los jovenes y asignarles audazmente grandes tareas, el Partido ha logrado situarlos como vanguardia juvenil. En virtud de esta muestra de confianza y amor, en cada fase de la revolucion nuestros jovenes se han ofrecido para la defensa nacional y los trabajos dificiles y engorrosos, demostrando plenamente su inteligencia y valor. 
					
					Hasta hoy nuestra revolucion ha podido avanzar ininterrumpidamente, sin estancarse ni detener el progreso, con evidente pujanza y vigor, lo cual se debe a un nutrido ejercito juvenil de acero que avanza recto en pos del Partido.
					
					La Central Hidroelectrica Jovenes Heroes Paektusan y otros enorgullecedores monumentos de la juventud que esta ha levantado en distintas partes del pais como regalos al aniversario del Partido, haciendo gala del patriotismo, demuestran patentemente como se prepara la reserva del PTC y como continua la revolucion generacion tras generacion.
					
					Nuestro Partido no ha escatimado esfuerzos en aras de la juventud y gracias a ello hoy el pais acoge el mayor esplendor del movimiento juvenil y hace gala de su condicion de potencia de la juventud, unica de su tipo en el mundo, que ha resuelto satisfactoriamente el problema de la juventud.
					
					El trayecto de nuestro Partido, que con miles vicisitudes ha conducido al triunfo la revolucion coreana, testimonia que no hay nada que temer ni nada irrealizable si contamos con un pueblo fiel al Partido, un poderoso ejercito revolucionario y unas nutridas tropas juveniles.
					
					El aprecio del pueblo, ejercito y juventud le da vida y fuerza al partido revolucionario y le asegura un futuro resplandeciente. Tal es la valiosa conclusion a la que ha llegado nuestro Partido al cabo de una historia de setenta anos.
					
					En adelante nuestro Partido seguira avanzando energicamente hacia el triunfo definitivo, asumiendo como poderosisimas armas las tres estrategias de aprecio del pueblo, ejercito y juventud, y culminara infaliblemente la revolucion coreana.
					
					Companeros:
					
					El PTC es organizador de nuestro pueblo y su orientador a victorias consecutivas.
					
					Su mayor gloria e invencibilidad radican en enaltecer a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il como eternos lideres y disfrutar del pleno apoyo y confianza de todo el pueblo.
					
					Para conducir a Corea y depararle un luminoso porvenir, el Partido debe mantener al pie de la letra e invariablemente el caracter revolucionario del gran partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista y fortalecerlo en todos los sentidos.
					
					El gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo es, en esencia, conceder primacia a las masas populares. Y su modo de vida consiste en servirle al pueblo.
					
					Nuestro Partido, en acato a la noble idea de los grandes lideres que por primera vez en la historia practicaron la politica de aprecio, respeto y amor al pueblo y a lo largo de su vida consagraron todo lo suyo para el, escribe y seguira escribiendo para siempre la sagrada historia de la prioridad de las masas populares.
					
					Desarrollara su construccion y sus actividades segun las indicaciones de los grandes lideres, plasmara cabalmente en todas sus labores la prioridad de las masas populares, orientando a toda su militancia a que le sirva al pueblo con entera disposicion, y asi multiplicara su combatividad.
					
					El verdadero aspecto del PTC se refleja en la imagen del pais acicalada por el y en el rostro del pueblo en el que se dibuja siempre la felicidad.
					
					No hay ser mas precioso que el pueblo, la quintaesencia del pais, ni nada mas sagrado que sus intereses.
					
					Nuestro Partido atesorara como mayor bien de la revolucion la sinceridad con que lo apoya el pueblo. Para nuestro pueblo valiente, inteligente y bello, sobrellevara todo el peso, transitara caminos tortuosos y pondra a su alcance todas las maravillas del mundo.
					
					Como personificacion de la abnegacion y madre invariable que le sirve lealmente al pueblo con ilimitada vitalidad y gran entusiasmo, cumplira su importante y sagrada mision y sera fiel a su tarea como responsable del destino del pueblo, por mucho que cambie el mundo.
					
					La revolucion coreana avanza no por alguna misteriosa fuerza divina sino por la gran fuerza de nuestro pueblo, incluida la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, que le sigue invariablemente.
